column3: Load items into ovens or furnaces
column5: Measure dimensions of completed products or work pieces to verify conformance to specifications
column7: Mix substances or compounds needed for work activities
column9: Feed materials or products into or through equipment
column11: Package products for storage or shipment
column13: Adjust equipment controls to regulate flow of production
column15: Heat material or work pieces to prepare for or complete production
column17: Monitor equipment operation to ensure proper functioning
column23: Remove products or work pieces from production equipment
column29: Move products, materials or equipment between work areas
column33: Position raw materials on processing or production equipment
column35: Place materials into or onto moulds
column41: Mark products, work pieces or equipment with identifying information
column45: Confer with others to resolve production problems or equipment malfunctions
column47: Notify others of equipment repair or maintenance needs
